text: @ArvindKejriwal @ArvindKejriwalSir,what kind of testing is done for Covid-19 in delhi,He work in airlineat T-3,heis suffering from fever of 103 from last 2 days,with throat pain and body pain in every 3 hours evenaftertakingmedicines,Given 5 days medicines at RML Hospital,delhi, reviewafter5days
